interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: C.O. Bigelow No. 007 Dr Hiosous Quince Hand Lotion, 4 Ounces
Review Date: 2019/12/21
Store: C. O. Bigelow
Average Rating: 4.6
Product Details: {'Brand': 'C. O. Bigelow', 'Item Form': 'Lotion', 'Unit Count': '4 Ounce', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Use for': 'Hands', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '6.6 x 2 x 0.7 inches; 5.61 Ounces', 'Item model number': '20002240'}
Review Text: This stuff is wonderful. It's been a game changer for my hands this winter. There is very little scent. Which suprised me because it's filled with so many natural extracts like apple, lemon, carrot, aloe, grapefruit.  The directions suggest to put on before bed and slip cotton gloves on. I'm not planning on doing that because I'm not 80, but am still very impressed at how long my hands feel protected and moisturized.
Review Title: Awesome product
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Natural Solution Himalayan Pink Salt Body Scrub with Organic Marula Essential Oil, Moisturizes and Nourishes Face & Skin - 12.3 Oz
Natural Solution
['Natural Solution Organic Marula Oil Body Scrub Exfoliate and nourish your skin with this luxurious Natural Solution body scrub made with organic marula oil. Marula oil is a natural oil & is known for its ability to moisturize and protect the skin, as well as to reduce the appearance of wrinkles and fine lines. This body scrub is also made with Himalayan pink salt, which is a natural exfoliator that helps to remove dead skin cells and leave your skin feeling smooth and soft. The scrub is gentle enough for daily use, and it is perfect for all skin types. Usage: Apply a generous amount of scrub to wet skin. Massage in circular motions for 2-3 minutes. Rinse with water. Use 2 times per week for best results. Caution: Avoid contact with eyes. If contact occurs, rinse immediately with water. Keep out of reach of children. Store in a cool, dry place. Benefits: 1- Exfoliates and removes dead skin cells 2- Moisturizes and nourishes the skin 3- Protects the skin from free radicals 4- Leaves skin feeling smooth and soft 5-Suitable for all skin types']
{'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '3.75 x 3.75 x 3.6 inches; 12.35 Ounces', 'Item model number': '8246E', 'UPC': '818581019775', 'Manufacturer': 'Natural Solution'}
There's not a lot of salt in here to make it exfoliate very well. That said, it moisturizes and hydrates beautifully. Everything dissolves and washes off completely and it smells so light and fresh!
Smells great! Works ok.

profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Preference:** The user continues to favor personal care products emphasizing natural ingredients, particularly oils known for their moisturizing and nourishing properties. They appreciate formulations containing natural extracts that contribute to effective hydration.

- **Keywords:** Himalayan pink salt, organic oils, exfoliation, hydration, nourishment, gentle on the skin, natural extracts.

- **Performance Expectations:** The user prioritizes effective moisturization and hydration over exfoliation effectiveness, as highlighted by their previous comments. They value products that provide lasting protection and moisturization for the skin.

- **Fragrance Sensitivity:** They exhibit a preference for products with minimal scent, favoring light and fresh aromas rather than overpowering fragrances.

- **Usage Pattern:** The user is comfortable with products intended for regular use, highlighting their desire for versatile solutions suitable for all skin types, particularly those that maintain skin health throughout varying seasonal challenges.

- **Overall Assessment:** The user is seeking skincare solutions that effectively balance hydration and nourishment with gentle formulations. They appreciate products that may include a range of beneficial natural extracts while ensuring skin comfort and moisture retention, aligning with their emphasis on effective and pleasant user experiences.
